manifesto.title: I diagnose structural problems and build systems to solve them.
manifesto.content:
I start with the same question on every project: Where is the structural fragmentation?

Not the surface symptom. The joints. The places where intent meets constraint and something either holds or breaks. The gap between what's promised and what actually works.

I work across three output channels:

**Narrative Systems** — How do you encode a brand story into infrastructure so it survives deployment? Aiden Jae. Altrueism. Everyday Gold. New City. The work that ensures positioning doesn't fracture when it hits technical reality.

**Visual Systems** — How do you build typographic and design systems that hold under variable content and scaling? Photogeography. Versagrams. Sentimentology. Echo & Bone. The work that makes identity structural instead of decorative.

**Technical Systems** — How do you build platforms and infrastructure that run for 12+ years without breaking? Encore. Portable Agency. AI DevOps Workbench. Savepoint Protocol. The work that proves the framework holds under real load.

Most projects require all three working together. The diagnostic method is consistent: identify the structural fragmentation, think through alternatives, find the integration point, build it. The foundation is Visual Communication—thirty years of understanding what happens when systems collapse under pressure.

This site indexes that work. Not by department. By the actual method:

**Protocols** — The frameworks that became necessary because existing tools failed.

**Applied Systems** — The proof these frameworks hold under real constraints.

**Practice** — The research and experimentation where principles get stress-tested.

legend.description: Decision-making frameworks. How the work gets built. Version control for intent.
Work deployed under constraint. Enterprise, commercial, personal. The proof the framework holds.
Active research. Stress-testing principles at low stakes. The laboratory.

routes.name: PROTOCOLS
routes.definition: Decision-making frameworks. The version control for intent.
routes.description: These aren't theories. They're tools I've built because existing tools failed under load. Savepoint Protocol runs on the understanding that context leaks and decisions need fallback. Aetherwright runs on the understanding that scale requires symbolic governance. AI DevOps Workbench runs on the understanding that multi-agent systems need provenance. Portable Agency runs on the understanding that digital autonomy requires local infrastructure. Each one solves a structural problem with uncompromising precision.

artifacts.title: SAVEPOINT PROTOCOL
artifacts.context: After 14 days on a feature, you can't remember why you made a decision. After a hospital visit or a crisis, the project context evaporates. This is cerebral leak. It collapses teams.
artifacts.spec: Semantic version control for thought. Capture intent. Index cognitive state. Write it down before you context-switch. v3.0 — CLI tool, open-source, designed for neurodivergent operators.
artifacts.result: People recover faster. Decisions stay bold when the fallback is documented. Teams operate on memory, not guesswork.

artifacts.title: ORDER OF THE AETHERWRIGHT
artifacts.context: Scale kills coherence. Add team members. Add platforms. Add constraints. The original vision fractures into contradictions. People disagree on what the thing even is.
artifacts.spec: A symbolic operating system. Map the story space. Establish frames and reels. Document what gets made and why. Creates unified conceptual governance without micromanagement.
artifacts.result: Teams stay coherent at scale. Founders and design leaders use this to keep complex IP honest when everything is pulling in different directions.

artifacts.title: AI DEVOPS WORKBENCH
artifacts.context: Throw a prompt at ChatGPT and you get output. Do it again and you can't reproduce it. Bring in multiple agents and nobody knows what happened or why. Drift accumulates. Provenance vanishes.
artifacts.spec: Structure for multi-agent AI workflows. JSON prompting as configuration. Orchestration that creates reproducible output. Each interaction documented. Each decision traceable.
artifacts.result: AI collaboration becomes operational. You can reproduce results. You can see what the agents learned. The system is auditable.

artifacts.title: PORTABLE AGENCY
artifacts.context: Everything lives in the cloud. One ISP outage. One corporate policy shift. One algorithm change. The entire infrastructure disappears.
artifacts.spec: Digital autonomy through local infrastructure. Homelab compute. Offline data sovereignty. Storage, media, AI compute—everything runs locally. Designed to work when the internet doesn't.
artifacts.result: Family operations run independent of any corporate provider. Infrastructure you own and understand. It just works.

routes.name: APPLIED SYSTEMS
routes.definition: The proof. Production deployments under real constraints.
routes.description: A system is only as valid as its performance when the load goes up. When the people operating it are tired. When the domain shrank overnight. Twelve years at 99.9% uptime isn't a portfolio highlight—it's structural proof. Luxury jewelry at scale. Philanthropic systems that maintain coherence through operational complexity. Household infrastructure running on zero willpower. These aren't case studies. They're proof the framework holds.

artifacts.title: ENCORE
artifacts.context: A recruitment platform serving Fortune 500 companies and federal agencies. Legacy .NET infrastructure colliding with modern web standards. The question: can you modernize without breaking mission-critical operations?
artifacts.spec: Architectural sovereignty. 12 years. 99.9% uptime. 40,000+ users. 2.5M+ transactions annually. Migrated from desktop-era code to modern React. No service interruption. Strangler Fig pattern applied with precision.
artifacts.result: This is what implementation fidelity looks like at scale. Not a perfect rebuild. A durable evolution where the original system doesn't break while being transformed.

artifacts.title: AIDEN-JAE
artifacts.context: A jewelry brand built on substance—recycled gold, ethical sourcing, real craftsmanship. The challenge: translate handmade quality into digital trust at scale.
artifacts.spec: Visual operating system from scratch. Texture-led photography. Custom Liquid and SCSS to bridge artisanal production and digital presentation. Sustainability woven into operational logic, not marketing claims.
artifacts.result: Accessible luxury achieved through architectural precision. Sustainable sourcing becomes a structural advantage, not a positioning claim. The architecture proves the story.

artifacts.title: EVERYDAY GOLD
artifacts.context: Fragrance commerce demands precision—scent variants, regulatory compliance, trademark clearance. Rules that can't be broken. Design constraint as material.
artifacts.spec: Swiss-style label system. Trademark research feeding design. Regulatory compliance becoming first-class design content. Modular production logic for scent variants. The grid holds the complexity.
artifacts.result: A brand that's legally sound and visually coherent. Regulatory information transformed into structural advantage, not a burden.

artifacts.title: ALTRUEISM
artifacts.context: Nonprofit that gives money away has to prove it's serious. Not just words. The infrastructure, the platform, the visual system—everything has to say 'transparency is structural here, not performative.'
artifacts.spec: Complete visual and operational identity system. Digital platform. Messaging architecture where philanthropic intent drives everything. No contradiction between what's said and what's built.
artifacts.result: Transformed a fractured brand into a premium-positioned operating system. Work delivered fully specified. Client didn't launch due to external funding constraints, not system failure.

artifacts.title: MODERNIST HOMESTEAD
artifacts.context: ADHD + autism + celiac disease + five culinary traditions + cross-border relocation = household systems either run on structure or they collapse. Willpower fails. Decisions fail. Food doesn't appear.
artifacts.spec: Zero-willpower systems. Culinary modularity across traditions. Celiac health navigation. Executive function scaffolding. Medical complexity as design constraint. Every default decision is structural, not willful.
artifacts.result: The family operates. Meals get made. Medical constraints get managed. Systems hold the structure so people don't have to make willpower-dependent decisions.

routes.name: PRACTICE
routes.definition: Active research. Stress-testing at low stakes.
routes.description: These are the laboratories. Narrative systems that can hold 40+ entity networks. Typography that holds under variable content. Photography locked to rigid formats. Music production running on signal flow protocols. These aren't products—they're experiments proving the framework scales across domains. Where the protocols get real.

artifacts.title: NEW CITY
artifacts.context: What happens when a city's infrastructure fails? Not dramatic collapse. Slow erosion. People adapt. New structures emerge. How do narratives hold when systems degrade?
artifacts.spec: A novel + game built on Kishōtenketsu narrative structure nested within a Hero's Journey macro. 40+ entity knowledge graph. Brooklyn/Sunset Park as geographic model. Neurodivergent protagonist navigating surveillance and rebuilding.
artifacts.result: The origin fractal. Where recursive system thinking first took form. A world where survival means seeing, not conquering.

artifacts.title: MATHONTAPE
artifacts.context: Most musicians treat composition as intuition. But intuition breaks at scale. Signal flow—the engineering discipline of audio routing—reveals composition as architecture.
artifacts.spec: Music production grounded in signal flow protocols. Not decoration. Composition as systems engineering. How audio moves through space. How constraints shape what can be heard.
artifacts.result: Structured, repeatable creative output. Discipline applied to sound like it's applied to code.

artifacts.title: PHOTOGEOGRAPHY
artifacts.context: Most photography pretends to be objective. But the frame is a choice. What if you locked the frame and let the world reveal itself through fixed constraint?
artifacts.spec: Three locked aspect ratios. Format as honest evidence. Each photograph holds the shape it arrived in. The constraint forces you to see differently. Rigid grid generates emergence.
artifacts.result: A visual archive that isn't trying to be pretty. Just present. The geography emerges from format-driven perception.

artifacts.title: THE DEEP CUTS
artifacts.context: Most people listen to music passively. What if listening was active? What if learning to DJ taught you to hear more completely?
artifacts.spec: A book teaching DJ methodology as a path to deeper music appreciation. Not for club DJs. For anyone who wants to understand music through the craft of selection, transition, and sequence.
artifacts.result: Active listening as learnable skill. Understanding comes through hands-on practice in selection and mixing.

artifacts.title: ECHO & BONE
artifacts.context: Archetypes aren't decoration. They're structural patterns that appear across cultures, myths, stories. Map them and you can build with them.
artifacts.spec: Symbolic taxonomy grounded in alchemical and archetypal systems. Not mysticism. Structural patterns made visible. How to build narrative and visual systems that resonate because they're built on archetypal logic.
artifacts.result: A working vocabulary for archetypal pattern that applies across domains—narrative, design, systems.

artifacts.title: VERSAGRAMS
artifacts.context: Typography alone can't convey feeling. Image alone can't hold structure. What happens when both are locked in constraint together?
artifacts.spec: Typography paired with AI-generated imagery. Fixed typographic rules. Parametric image generation. The constraint creates emergence. Verse made visible through letter and image.
artifacts.result: Proof that feeling can be encoded systematically. The intersection of structure and generation.
